headline: FleishmanHillard Appoints Mary Kosinski as Global Managing Director of Health and Life Sciences
summary: FleishmanHillard today announced that Mary Kosinski has joined the agency as global managing director of Health and Life Sciences effective immediately. Kosinski will lead FleishmanHillard's largest sector and be responsible for driving transformation, expanding focus and delivering integrated solutions for clients.
